List of Chrome Extensions

Feb 28, 2010

Since there isn’t (yet) any easy way to sync Google Chrome extensions across computers, I’m using this post to keep a list of my currently installed Chrome extensions. Hopefully it is useful for other people as well.

Essential Extensions

  • 1Password
  • AdBlock (and browser button)
  • Docs PDF/PowerPoint Viewer
  • Email this page
  • Evernote Web Clipper
  • Flashblock
  • Mendely Web Importer
  • New TongWenTang
  • RSS Subscription Extension
  • Stop Autoplay for YouTube
  • Xmarks Bookmark Sync 
<strong>Also useful</strong>
